ygData.subject: Yggdrasil and Devilcat near Maxies
ygData.msgSnippet: Yggdrasil: Got it. In just a few nanocycles, we ll enter the range of their sensors. If they re on full alert, their defenses can go on. Be ready just in case.

Yggdrasil: Got it. In just a few nanocycles, we'll enter the range of
their sensors. If they're on full alert, their defenses can go on. Be
ready just in case.

He transforms and takes his shield out.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "Odds are we'll be splitting the talking, but I'd suggest you 
> introduce us."  In his mind, Devilcat runs through possible scenarios 
> for what could happen once they're inside.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil looked and focused. Although the base was a bit far, it 
> was
> > nothing for robots of their kind.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: That seems to be a pursuit ship. It might have been sent
> > after the preds originally. That's the one. So, you want me or you 
> to
> > do the talking?
